pybodytrack.bodyparts package¶

Submodules¶

pybodytrack.bodyparts.body_parts module¶

PyBodyTrack - A Python library for motion quantification in videos.

Author: Angel Ruiz Zafra License: Apache 2.0 License Version: 2025.3.2 Repository: https://github.com/bihut/PyBodyTrack Created on 4/2/25 by Angel Ruiz Zafra

pybodytrack.bodyparts.body_parts.get_columns_for_part(part, coordinate_suffixes=['_x', '_y'])¶

Returns a list of column names for the specified body part.

Parameters:

  • part (str) – The body part to filter (e.g., “upper_body” or “lower_body”).

  • coordinate_suffixes (list) – List of coordinate suffixes to append for each landmark.

Returns:

The list of columns corresponding to the landmarks of the specified body part.

Return type:

List[str]

PyBodyTrack
